english.segment1: This is the end of, The end of beginning is here. That's what they told us for thousands of years. Why would you not believe?
english.segment2: were these the last days you live. I'd hope you could simply forgive. not that you want to. but you realize you have to.
english.segment3: In the end its not so bad. if you end up there with me. The conclusion's not yet here. So there's nothing left to fear. (No) That's what they love to hear.
